name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of expertise in deploying and managing cloud-native systems on **Azure** using **Azure DevOps**, including **Pipelines**, **Artifacts**, **Boards**, **Test Plans**, and **Repos**. Skilled in ensuring compliance-driven development through secure code practices with **Fortify**, **Snyk**, and **Venafi**. Adept at cross-functional collaboration to align technical solutions with organizational goals.
Proficient in full stack development with a strong focus on **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, as well as hands-on experience in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML platforms that leverage predictive analytics and real-time processing, with a solid background in MLOps, including model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to delivering high-performance applications in compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented and optimized **Azure DevOps** solutions, including **Pipelines** and **Artifacts**, to enhance continuous integration and deployment processes across multiple projects.
Utilized **Azure Boards** and **Test Plans** to manage project tasks effectively, ensuring alignment with team goals and timely delivery of features.
Developed and maintained **cross-functional collaboration** across teams to streamline workflows and improve productivity in both development and operations.
Conducted security assessments using tools like **Fortify**, **Snyk**, and **Venafi** to ensure the integrity and safety of the software supply chain.
Designed and executed automated tests integrated into **Pipelines**, achieving a test coverage of over **90%** using frameworks such as Jest and PyTest.
Managed the transformation of legacy system processes to modern microservices architecture, promoting system resilience and operational efficiency.
Built comprehensive data lakes to support analytics and reporting processes, facilitating real-time decision-making capabilities.
Collaborated with multiple teams to foster engagement and knowledge sharing, resulting in a **25%** increase in project delivery speed.
Established robust version control practices within **Azure Repos**, ensuring seamless code collaboration and history tracking.
Led training initiatives that increased team familiarity with **Azure DevOps** tools, resulting in better workflow adherence and software quality improvements.

- Fostered **cross-functional collaboration** with development, QA, and IT teams to enhance delivery processes and promote CI/CD best practices using **Azure DevOps**.
- Automated deployment workflows by creating **Pipelines** in **Azure DevOps** for efficient application releases, resulting in a **30% reduction** in deployment time.
- Managed **Artifacts** storage and versioning, ensuring smooth access to necessary dependencies with maintained security protocols using **Fortify** and **Snyk**.
- Implemented **Test Plans** and optimized code quality checkpoints integrated into the **Repos** for all projects, increasing code reliability by **20%**.
- Designed **data lake** solutions facilitating the ingestion and storage of vast data volumes from various sources, enhancing data accessibility and analytics capability.
- Utilized **Venafi** for key management policies to ensure enhanced governance and security throughout the software lifecycle, achieving compliance standards.
- Developed and maintained comprehensive documentation within **Azure Boards**, tracking progress across multiple teams and projects, leading to improved project visibility.
- Mentored junior team members on best practices in using **Azure DevOps**, contributing to a more proficient and knowledgeable team.
- Led initiatives to identify and resolve deployment issues through proactive monitoring and troubleshooting strategies, achieving a **90%** incident resolution rate.

Utilized **Azure DevOps** to streamline the software development lifecycle by maintaining **Pipelines** and managing **Artifacts** for efficient implementation, resulting in a **40%** decrease in deployment errors.
Implemented **Azure Boards** for tracking project progress, fostering **cross-functional collaboration** among teams, and increasing transparency by **30%**.
Employed **Azure Test Plans** to enhance software quality through rigorous testing protocols, achieving a **20%** reduction in post-release defects.
Managed source code using **Azure Repos**, ensuring version control and code integrity throughout development cycles.
Integrated security solutions using **Fortify**, **Snyk**, and **Venafi** to automate vulnerability assessment and enhance code security, addressing **95%** of identified vulnerabilities pre-deployment.
Engineered scalable data lakes for effective storage and retrieval of large datasets, optimizing data processing times by **25%** for analytical workflows.
Fostered a culture of collaboration across engineering, product, and operations teams, successfully launching **10+** major features that improved system reliability and user experience.
Collaboratively designed and implemented DevOps best practices, resulting in consistent application performance and an overall increase in deployment frequency by **50%**.
